tagline: A platform for gamers/streamers to provide their casual service.
desc: This is project that temporary hire people to play game with you. You can imagine this as you hire someone to work for you for few hours, but unlike conventional task, this is about game companion.

__**From consumer perspective:**__ 
:small_orange_diamond: You are a big fans of a professional/famous gamer, you want to play a game with him, either as sparring partner(opponent) or team mate. 
:small_orange_diamond: You are a fans of good looking or fun streamer, you want to play with her/him. 
:small_orange_diamond: You are looking for game coach, gamer that systemized his knowledge and make you a better gamer. 
:small_orange_diamond: You are looking for booster, gamer that help you rank up by either playing your account or as your team mate.

tasks.title: Trello Tasks
tasks.desc: We use Trello to manage the tasks within this project, [here](https://trello.com/invite/b/tAyH3oig/a5374e9eaa1bbe644f3e7367d1e23300/game-senshi) is your invitation. Further information on how to use Trello and claim a task can be found in the [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/zero-to-mastery/GameSenshi/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) file on Github.
